# Conditional probabilities

<!-- break -->

## Bayes' theorem

$$
\Pr(A | B) = \frac{\Pr(B | A) \Pr(A)}{\Pr(B)}
$$

## Law of total probability

$$
\Pr(B) = \sum_{i = 1}^{2} \Pr(B | A_i)\Pr(A_i)
$$
